page.post_content:
At Italian Food +,

we take pride in combining traditional Italian and modern Australian cuisine to bring you a truly unique range of flavours. Our menus are inspired by the rich heritage of Italian cuisine and are crafted with passion and love straight from the heart.

We have a wide variety of dishes to satisfy all of your cravings. Our wood-fired pizzas are made with the freshest ingredients and are cooked to perfection in our traditional pizza oven. We have a wide selection of pasta dishes, including classic favorites like spaghetti Bolognese and lasagne, and more creative options like squid ink spaghetti and truffle gnocchi.

In addition to our pasta and pizza options, we also offer a range of gourmet salads, seafood dishes, and steak and ribs that are sure to delight your taste buds. Our seafood options include a variety of fresh fish and shellfish, while our steak and ribs are cooked to perfection and served with various sauces and sides.

We believe that everyone should be able to enjoy a delicious meal, and that's why we have something for everyone, whether you're a meat lover, vegetarian or vegan, gluten-free, or have any other dietary restrictions. We make sure to provide options for all of our customers to choose from and dine with us comfortably.

At Italian Food +, we're committed to providing an authentic and delicious dining experience. We use only the freshest ingredients and traditional methods to create dishes that will transport you straight to Italy. Whether you're a regular customer or just visiting for the first time, we hope you'll come and experience the flavours, smells, and warmth of our Italian cuisine at Italian Food +; we've got something for everyone!
page.content:
At Italian Food +,

we take pride in combining traditional Italian and modern Australian cuisine to bring you a truly unique range of flavours. Our menus are inspired by the rich heritage of Italian cuisine and are crafted with passion and love straight from the heart.

We have a wide variety of dishes to satisfy all of your cravings. Our wood-fired pizzas are made with the freshest ingredients and are cooked to perfection in our traditional pizza oven. We have a wide selection of pasta dishes, including classic favorites like spaghetti Bolognese and lasagne, and more creative options like squid ink spaghetti and truffle gnocchi.

In addition to our pasta and pizza options, we also offer a range of gourmet salads, seafood dishes, and steak and ribs that are sure to delight your taste buds. Our seafood options include a variety of fresh fish and shellfish, while our steak and ribs are cooked to perfection and served with various sauces and sides.

We believe that everyone should be able to enjoy a delicious meal, and that’s why we have something for everyone, whether you’re a meat lover, vegetarian or vegan, gluten-free, or have any other dietary restrictions. We make sure to provide options for all of our customers to choose from and dine with us comfortably.

At Italian Food +, we’re committed to providing an authentic and delicious dining experience. We use only the freshest ingredients and traditional methods to create dishes that will transport you straight to Italy. Whether you’re a regular customer or just visiting for the first time, we hope you’ll come and experience the flavours, smells, and warmth of our Italian cuisine at Italian Food +; we’ve got something for everyone!
